name: Tifa Endless Shooter Runner Game
description:
Embark on an exciting adventure with Tifa, in this thrilling endless runner and shooter, collect as many coins as you can while dodging obstacles and battling enemies. Put your skills to the test and see how far you can go in this challenging yet rewarding experience!

This was my first game that I created with Unreal Engine a while back. Hope everyone enjoys this.

NOTE: The main menu can be tricky sometimes to get the cursor to show up. Tapping the windows button on your keyboard usually fixes this if you have that issue.
